scripts.coverage: jest --coverage --coverage-reporters=lcov --coverage-reporters=text --coverage-directory ./docs/coverage && find docs/coverage -name '*.html' | xargs sed -i '/generated by/d'
scripts.cleanbuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.cleanwatch: npm run clean && npm run watch
scripts.cleantest: npm run cleanbuild && npm run test
scripts.cleanrei: npm run rei && npm run cleantest
scripts.cleancoverage: npm run cleanbuild && npm run coverage
scripts.releasebuild: ./tools/remove_rei_files && npm run cleanbuild && ./tools/generate_rei_files && npm run cleancoverage
